titleStmt.title: Instructions and devotions for the afflicted and sick with some help for prisoners; such especially as are to be tryed for life.
titleStmt.author: Gother, John, d. 1704.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Gother by Wing.
Identified as Wing (2nd ed.) G1329dA on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700", reel 1831.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
